p.k: India Summer is running for City Council, barnstorming through a local neighborhood, when she knocks on Sloan Harper's door, who just so happens to be running against her! It's Sloan's first run at politics, and she invites inside India to talk, but things quickly get heated when the veteran, India, mocks Sloan's inexperience, among other things! Sloan likes pussy, and she's got a feeling India might secretly like it too! Sloan decides to test out her theory, but will she be able to sway India's 'vote'?
